title: WE’RE BACK! Bobby Details Scary Armed Situation At His Home Last Night + We Rate Our Christmas Breaks + Bobby’s New Year’s Resolution Is to “Do Less”
itunes:title: WE’RE BACK! Bobby Details Scary Armed Situation At His Home Last Night + We Rate Our Christmas Breaks + Bobby’s New Year’s Resolution Is to “Do Less”
description:
We’re back from Christmas break! We talk all about what we did over vacation and rate our breaks. Bobby and Amy share what their resolutions are for the New Year. Bobby explains what he means by his being to “do less” and Amy has a very personal “resolution”. We also remember Betty White and John Madden who passed away over the break.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
